titles.title: Project to Protect America Act
Project to Protect America Act
To provide for a demonstration project under which a basic housing allowance will be afforded to Federal law enforcement officers serving in high-cost areas, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: Project to Protect America Act - Requires the Office of Personnel Management to provide for a demonstration project under which eligible federal employees who are holding positions that: (1) are in or under the Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI); (2) are classified under a GS 1811 position (criminal investigative series regarding criminal investigators); and (3) are within high-cost areas will be be paid a basic housing allowance.
